name: Life After Loop
description:
An end is a new beginning, but not for you.  To beat your foes, you must first stop the ritual that gives them mastery over death itself!

WASD to move

Left Click to chain enemies

Right Click to torch everything in your path

I completely slept through the first two days of the Jam, so this project has taken every spare second of my school week.  It's been awesome to be a part of something like this, and I hope you'll enjoy what I've made.  Every sprite and every script is made by me.  The only external sources used were Astar 2D pathfinding (which Brackeys made a tutorial on so I figured it was fair game) and BFXR for basic sound effects.
